verbs.description: Even though he [V: wo] n't be in office in 2026 , Trump is pushing hard for the North American bid to host the World Cup .
Even though [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: be] [ARG2: in office] [ARGM-TMP: in 2026] , Trump is pushing hard for the North American bid to host the World Cup .
Even though he wo n't be in office in 2026 , Trump [V: is] pushing hard for the North American bid to host the World Cup .
[ARGM-ADV: Even though he wo n't be in office in 2026] , [ARG0: Trump] is [V: pushing] [ARGM-MNR: hard] [ARG2: for the North American bid to host the World Cup] .
Even though he wo n't be in office in 2026 , Trump is pushing hard for the North American bid to [V: host] [ARG1: the World Cup] .
